resources.string: Automatically switch to a preferred network when both WLAN network and mobile network are available.
When a WLAN network is detected to have poor connection quality, mobile network will be used instead. When turned off, WLAN connection will be prioritized.

Predict network conditions by analyzing WLAN signal data. If poor WLAN network quality is expected, this will automatically switch to a mobile network. WLAN connection will be prioritized for home network use.
